title: Strengthening Machine Learning Competencies: Experiential Learning-Based Project Design for Social Work Practicum

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze emotional contexts of child protection cases via 360-degree video simulations and propose three or more relationship-based intervention strategies.
Project teams can design field-oriented problem-solving scenarios and create practical reports using digital tools.
Learners can critically evaluate existing social work practices based on experiential learning outcomes and propose two improvement directions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
